name: Elon Musk
title: Chief Twit / Technoking
archetypeDescription: Runs 5 companies, posts at 3am, and somehow convinced people that sleeping at the office is sigma behavior

moves.name: 3AM Tweet Storm
moves.effect: Tanks own stock price, confuses everyone

moves.name: First Principles Rant
moves.effect: Makes opponent question everything they know

flavor: The only man who can mass layoff an entire company and have people thank him for it.
bangerQuote: Bought Twitter to fix free speech, turned it into the world's most expensive shitposting platform.
naturalRival: The SEC, sleep, and anyone who asks about Cybertruck windows
roastBullets: Paid $44 billion for a website, immediately made it worth $12 billion, called it a win
Has 11 kids but still finds time to post memes at 2am like a teenager
Promised self-driving cars by 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024... any day now
The only CEO whose HR strategy is 'tweet something wild and see who quits'
